original_text: He also says this: ‘I will trust God completely.’ He says this too: ‘I stand here with the children that God has given me.’ 2: These words are in Isaiah 8:17-18. The writer takes all these words from the Old Testament as if Jesus is speaking them. They show that Jesus thinks about us as his family. He became human, like us. As a man, Jesus trusted God. He believed that God would bring him safely through great trouble and death. He believed that, after his death, God would bring him back to heaven. He also says this:
korean_text: 또 다시 내가 그를 의지하리라 하시고 또 다시 볼지어다 나와 및 하나님께서 내게 주신 자녀라 하셨으니

sentences.original_text: 'I stand here with the children that God has given me.'
sentences.korean_translation: '나는 하나님이 내게 주신 자녀들과 함께 여기 서 있습니다.'

sentences.original_text: The writer takes all these words from the Old Testament
sentences.korean_translation: 저자는 이 모든 말씀을 구약에서 가져옵니다

sentences.original_text: as if Jesus is speaking them.
They show that Jesus thinks about us as his family.
sentences.korean_translation: 이것은 예수께서 우리를 자신의 가족으로 생각하심을 보여줍니다.

sentences.original_text: As a man, Jesus trusted God.
He believed that God would bring him safely
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 하나님이 그를 안전하게 인도하실 것을 믿었습니다

sentences.original_text: He believed that, after his death,
God would bring him back to heaven.
sentences.korean_translation: 하님이 그를 하늘로 다시 데려가실 것을 믿었습니다.
